entryView.telTitle: Enter a phone number for callback
entryView.popup: To create an appointment, you need to choose a master, select a service, pick a date, and provide your phone number for callback.

introduce.title: Your Path to the Ideal Outer Appearance: BarberShop - Beyond the Ordinary!

servicesComponent.work: working hours of the barber club

mastersComponent.title: OUR MASTERS
mastersComponent.masterTwo: Roman - Your Look in My Hands:
mastersComponent.masterThree: Volodymyr - Every Hair Has Its Story:
mastersComponent.yuriTxt: Professionalism and meticulous attention to detail - that's our creed. I always strive to provide you with a hairstyle that distinctly complements your style and individuality.
mastersComponent.romanTxt: Creative and inventive, I love experimenting with haircuts and creating unique styles. Visit me, and together we'll find a look that suits you perfectly.
mastersComponent.volodymyrTxt: An experienced master who understands and respects each strand of hair. My goal is to make your appearance impeccable and express your personality through an individualized approach to haircuts.
mastersComponent.ihorTxt: In my hands, your look will become sophisticated and stylish. I believe that every client deserves quality service and a hairstyle that accentuates their uniqueness. Entrust your appearance to me, and you will be satisfied.

aboutUsComponent.title: ABOUT US
aboutUsComponent.info: BarberShop emerged as a synthesis of traditional barbering and a creative approach to fashion. With great passion and respect for our clients, we've created a space where each haircut is a creative act, and every client is a part of our family.
aboutUsComponent.infoPartTwo: At BarberShop, we believe in the true power of appearance. Our skilled craftsmen not only cut hair but also create unparalleled looks that highlight your style and individuality.

contactComponent.title: Contact Information for the Barber Shop
